thread.title: Wonderful stay at Hotel La Laterne!
thread.title_full: Wonderful stay at Hotel La Laterne! - Review of Hotel La Lanterne, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Ruudx4
title: Wonderful stay at Hotel La Laterne!
text: A very cosy and charming little Hotel in the heart of Paris, just about a 5-min walk from Notre Dame/place Saint Michel. In a quite and safe area (just nearby a policestation). Very clean rooms with nice furniture, good madrasses, delisious breakfast, a wonderfull spa-area, swimmingpool/Hammam etc. We really enjoyed our 3 days stay at this Hotel and we will for sure be back!! :)
